name: semantic-release-helm-with-helmdocs
description: semantic-release plugin to update version and app version and generate documentation in a Helm chart. semantic-release-helm-with-helmdocs plugin was forked from verison 2.2.0 of semantic-release-helm and the version of Helm-Docs that was tested within the development of semantic-release-helm-with-helmdocs was 1.11.0
author: Mihai Plasoianu <mihai@plasoianu.de>
